page.title: 15 STONE BYPASS
page.content: Stone is situated on the A418 The Oxford Road. This is the main road between Aylesbury and Thame(a reasonably large market town ) and Oxford (a centre for shopping and entertainment). The A418 is a very busy road with heavy transport using it throughout the day,and much commuter traffic travelling along it between the hours of 8 and 9 in the morning and 5 and 7 in the evening. To relieve the village of this traffic a by-pass has been proposed. Several routes have been suggested and we are still waiting for the final decision let alone the road.
